name: Farrah's Big Adventure
description:
A long time ago, the world was a happy place. There was balance, humans treated everything with respect. Over time this balance has been lost. A few noticed and tried to make a change but their pleas fell on deaf ears. Now, the world is more machine than nature. There is no balance. Our hero – Farrah finds herself alone with the belief that she can save the world. After accumulating great technical knowledge, she has constructed a suit as well as an AI friend named Gray to increase her ability to jump, survive, and navigate the world. Realizing that time is running out Farrah and Gray must use all their knowledge and skill to bring balance back to the world and defeat the evil robot lord Timothy!

Play from the perspective of Gray – Farrah’s smart AI friend with ability to control Farrah’s suit and more!
